thread.title: Soap | Emmerdale

author: Fiona Flynn
title: Soap | Emmerdale
text: Adam is troubled by what he has seen on the video and confronts Aaron on it, asking him directly if he shot Robert. Of course Aaron insists that he didn't which Adam believes but looks like it may be too late as Victoria has unwittingly uploaded the video to the internet and pretty soon everyone gets to see Aaron concealing the murder weapon, including the police....
